content: इक्ष्वाकुः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of the celebrated ancestor of the solar kings who ruled in Ayodhyā; he was the first of the Solar kings and was a son of Manu Vaivasvata; (<ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Bhāg.</ls> क्षुवतस्तु मनोर्जज्ञ इक्ष्वाकुर्घ्राणतः सुतः); इक्ष्वाकुवंशोऽ भिमतः प्रजानां <ls>U. 1. 44.</ls> {@--2@} A descendant of Ikṣvāku; गलितवयसामिक्ष्वाकूणामिदं हि कुलव्रतं <ls>R. 3. 70.</ls> --कुः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} A kind of bitter gourd.
